setting.time: 1930s Moscow, mid-morning, day after theatre incident
setting.location: Elegant Moscow apartment, different from Margarita's, ransacked rooms
setting.weather: Interior, bright daylight streaming through windows

characters.appearance: Large black cat, size of small person, standing upright on hind legs, alone and fully autonomous
characters.clothing: Still wearing white bow tie, now slightly askew, anthropomorphic stance
characters.position: Standing on hind legs at ornate dining table
characters.action: Eating caviar directly from expensive crystal bowl with front paw

characters.appearance: Terrified apartment resident, middle-aged woman, 40s, in nightgown
characters.clothing: Silk nightgown, house robe thrown over shoulders, hair in curlers
characters.position: Cowering in doorway of her own dining room
characters.action: Clutching doorframe, staring in disbelief at the scene

scene.mainElements: Luxurious apartment dining room with formal table setting, expensive furniture overturned
scene.details: Crystal chandelier still swaying slightly, expensive china scattered on Persian rug, caviar and champagne bottles opened on table, silk curtains torn, oil paintings askew on walls, silver serving pieces scattered
scene.background: Glimpse of other ransacked rooms through doorways, morning sunlight revealing full extent of chaos
scene.atmosphere: Supernatural mischief in respectable domestic setting, impossible sight of independent cat enjoying luxury while chaos reigns, dark comedy of social order overturned, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot from room entrance, capturing both cat's casual behavior and human shock
composition.focus: The surreal image of upright cat dining elegantly amid destruction
composition.depth: Foreground: scattered expensive items and overturned furniture; middle ground: cat at dining table; background: terrified resident and glimpse of other damaged rooms
